sentences.en: Pausanias has come on a magical journey to find out about the present day Olympic Games.
sentences.cn: 帕萨尼亚斯通过神奇的旅行来到现在以搞清当今奥运会的一些事情.

sentences.en: Pausanias, who was a Greek writer 2000 years ago, has come on a magical journey to find out about the present day Olympic Games.
sentences.cn: 帕萨尼亚斯是一位2000年前的古希腊作家，经过一路不可思议的跋涉后，来询问有关现代奥运会情况。

sentences.en: What is in question is properly speaking the same theme which is proposed to us by the discourse of Pausanias.
sentences.cn: 受到质疑的，适当来说，是相同的主题，由保撒尼亚斯的论述跟我们建议。

trans.tran_cn: 保塞尼亚斯(2世纪希腊历史学家、地理学家)
